turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Hypochaeris sessiliflora.
turn.1: What is the English name of Chikku Chikku?
turn.2: Hypochaeris sessiliflora Chikku Chikku (Hypochaeris sessiliflora) is a South American species of plants in the daisy family.
turn.4: It is a terrestrial herb of high Andean forest to high altitude páramo (2,500–4,500 m).
turn.6: "Hypochaeris sessiliflora" is a small plant rarely more than 13 cm tall.
turn.8: Flowers are usually yellow or white, rarely purple or orange.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: Each head contains about 25 ray flowers but no disc flowers.
